message: Bob, I'm offering you this exceptional product at a price of $1500000. I believe it holds tremendous value, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment. Let me know your thoughts!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $1200000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I value this product at a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $1300000.  This price still reflects the substantial value I believe this product holds for you. I'm confident it will be a smart investment for your business. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. Given the current market conditions and my budget constraints, I am willing to consider $1250000 as a fair price for this product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
